string.name: track_santa
string.translation_description: Button text for to start tracking Santa on a Map

string.name: track_santa_two_lines
string.translation_description: Button text to start tracking Santa on a Map

string.name: santa_takes_off_in
string.translation_description: How much time until Christmas Eve, when Santa starts his journey to deliver presents

string.name: santa_is_busy_preparing_for_next_year
string.translation_description: Santa has finished delivering this years' presents and he's preparing for next year.

resources.string: Santa is busy preparing for next year.

string.name: view_old_stops
string.translation_description: Santa's journey is complete but you can see where he stopped off last year

string.name: contacting_santa
string.translation_description: Lets users know that the app is trying to get in touch with Santa

string.name: still_trying_to_reach_santa
string.translation_description: Having trouble reaching Santa but still trying

string.name: days
string.translation_description: Part of the countdown to take off - Days left. Please keep this string short.

string.name: hrs
string.translation_description: Part of the countdown to take off - Hours left. Please keep this string short.

string.name: min
string.translation_description: Part of the countdown to take off - Minutes left. Please keep this string short.

string.name: sec
string.translation_description: Part of the countdown to take off - Seconds left. Please keep this string short.

string.name: menu_share
string.translation_description: Share menu item. Will likely be high scores but could be others

string.name: menu_share_friends
string.translation_description: Share menu item. Will likely be a prompt to get a friend to install the app.

string.name: legal_notice
string.translation_description: Takes users to a list of legal privacy documents

string.name: legal_notice_text
string.translation_description: Link for legal notices

string.name: privacy_policy
string.translation_description: Link for privacy policy

string.name: terms_of_service
string.translation_description: Link for terms of services

string.name: open_source_licenses
string.translation_description: Licenses for open source components

string.name: open_source_repo_santa
string.translation_description: Web link to find the source code for this Santa app on the 'GitHub' site

string.name: scene_not_available
string.translation_description: Not available yet

string.name: until_takeoff
string.translation_description: Label under countdown for time until Santa takes off.

string.name: web_scene_error
string.translation_description: Short error message displayed on screen when a scene could not be loaded.

resources.string: Sorry, could not load the scene.

string.name: check_back_daily
string.translation_description: Label to inform users to check back every day for new games.

resources.string: Check back daily for new games!

string.name: new_games
string.translation_description: Header label above the prompt to check back daily for new games.

string.name: new_card
string.translation_description: Label for cards that are set to be 'new'.

string.name: tracker_opens_date
string.translation_description: Label for tracker card, stating the tracker's opening date.

string.name: time
string.translation_description: Label for the remaining time of a game.

string.name: download_dialog_title
string.translation_description: Title for a dialog asking the user whether to download a game.

string.name: download_dialog_message
string.translation_description: Message for a dialog asking the user whether to download a game when they are on a metered network.

resources.string: We need to download the game from the Play Store before you can play. This device is currently connected to a metered network which may charge you for any data transferred.\n\nDo you wish to proceed?

string.name: elf_maker_write_success
string.translation_description: Success message shown when the image has been saved

string.name: elf_maker_write_fail
string.translation_description: Error message shown when a problem was hit when saving the image

resources.string: We hit an error while saving image to device photos
